17  package com.facebook.buck.apple;
18  
19  import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap;
20  import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMultimap;
21  import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet;
22  
23  /**
24   * File types used in Apple targets.
25   */
26  public final class FileTypes {
27  
28    // Utility class. Do not instantiate.
29    private FileTypes() { }
30  
31    /**
32     * Map of file extension to Apple UTI (Uniform Type Identifier).
33     */
34    public static final ImmutableMap<String, String> FILE_EXTENSION_TO_UTI =
35        ImmutableMap.<String, String>builder()
36            .put("a", "archive.ar")
37            .put("app", "wrapper.application")
38            .put("appex", "wrapper.app-extension")
39            .put("bdic", "file")
40            .put("bin", "archive.macbinary")
41            .put("bmp", "image.bmp")
42            .put("bundle", "wrapper.cfbundle")
43            .put("c", "sourcecode.c.c")
44            .put("cc", "sourcecode.cpp.cpp")
45            .put("cpp", "sourcecode.cpp.cpp")
46            .put("css", "text.css")
47            .put("cxx", "sourcecode.cpp.cpp")
48            .put("dart", "sourcecode")
49            .put("dylib", "compiled.mach-o.dylib")
50            .put("exp", "sourcecode.exports")
51            .put("framework", "wrapper.framework")
52            .put("fsh", "sourcecode.glsl")
53            .put("gyp", "sourcecode")
54            .put("gypi", "text")
55            .put("h", "sourcecode.c.h")
56            .put("hxx", "sourcecode.cpp.h")
57            .put("icns", "image.icns")
58            .put("java", "sourcecode.java")
59            .put("jar", "archive.jar")
60            .put("jpeg", "image.jpeg")
61            .put("jpg", "image.jpeg")
62            .put("js", "sourcecode.javascript")
63            .put("json", "text.json")
64            .put("m", "sourcecode.c.objc")
65            .put("mm", "sourcecode.cpp.objcpp")
66            .put("nib", "wrapper.nib")
67            .put("o", "compiled.mach-o.objfile")
68            .put("octest", "wrapper.cfbundle")
69            .put("pdf", "image.pdf")
70            .put("pl", "text.script.perl")
71            .put("plist", "text.plist.xml")
72            .put("pm", "text.script.perl")
73            .put("png", "image.png")
74            .put("proto", "text")
75            .put("py", "text.script.python")
76            .put("r", "sourcecode.rez")
77            .put("rez", "sourcecode.rez")
78            .put("rtf", "text.rtf")
79            .put("s", "sourcecode.asm")
80            .put("storyboard", "file.storyboard")
81            .put("strings", "text.plist.strings")
82            .put("tif", "image.tiff")
83            .put("tiff", "image.tiff")
84            .put("tcc", "sourcecode.cpp.cpp")
85            .put("ttf", "file")
86            .put("vsh", "sourcecode.glsl")
87            .put("xcassets", "folder.assetcatalog")
88            .put("xcconfig", "text.xcconfig")
89            .put("xcodeproj", "wrapper.pb-project")
90            .put("xcdatamodel", "wrapper.xcdatamodel")
91            .put("xcdatamodeld", "wrapper.xcdatamodeld")
92            .put("xctest", "wrapper.cfbundle")
93            .put("xib", "file.xib")
94            .put("y", "sourcecode.yacc")
95            .put("zip", "archive.zip")
96            .build();
97  
98    /**
99     * Set of UTIs which only work as "lastKnownFileType" and not "explicitFileType"
100    * in a PBXFileReference.
101    *
102    * Yes, really. Because Xcode.
103    */
104   public static final ImmutableSet<String> EXPLICIT_FILE_TYPE_BROKEN_UTIS =
105     ImmutableSet.of("file.xib");
106 
107   /**
108    * Multimap of Apple UTI (Uniform Type Identifier) to file extension(s).
109    */
110   public static final ImmutableMultimap<String, String> UTI_TO_FILE_EXTENSIONS;
111 
112   static {
113     // Invert the map of (file extension -> UTI) pairs to
114     // (UTI -> [file extension 1, ...]) pairs.
115     ImmutableMultimap.Builder<String, String> builder = ImmutableMultimap.builder();
116     for (ImmutableMap.Entry<String, String> entry : FILE_EXTENSION_TO_UTI.entrySet()) {
117       builder.put(entry.getValue(), entry.getKey());
118     }
119     UTI_TO_FILE_EXTENSIONS = builder.build();
120   }
121 }
